doc.str: BATTERY MANAGEMENT DEVICE AND PORTABLE COMPUTER

A battery management device (1) and a portable computer. The battery management device (1) is used for managing a rechargeable battery (3) disposed within the portable computer. The portable computer includes a charging circuit (2) for charging the battery (3). The battery management device (1) includes a discharging circuit (14) for discharging the battery (3); an obtaining module (11) for obtaining a mode determination parameter; a first determination module (12) for determining whether or not to enter a battery storage mode according the mode determination parameter; and a first control module (13) for controlling the charging circuit (2) or the discharging circuit (14) in the battery storage mode so that the power of the battery (3) is controlled to be lower than a second power threshold. The performance of the battery (3) which is stored with its power lower than the second power threshold is better than the performance of the battery (3) which is stored with its power higher than the second power threshold. The battery management device (1) can delay the deterioration of the capacity of the rechargeable battery (3) within the portable computer.
